intro.title: Modeling Mode
intro.overview:
Welcome to the Hydrological Modeling Mode! This mode empowers you to explore and execute a range of hydrological models using the CONFLUENCE workflow, providing insights into water resource dynamics. Configure and run simulations using established models like SUMMA, FUSE, MESH, and more.

Get started by selecting a model (or "All of the above") from the dropdown menu below. Once you're ready, click "Run Model(s)" to initiate the simulation.
